title: Like any child only more so (TEFC)
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles, Maile Ornellas and Catherine Allan
brief_description: Discusses hyperactivity in children. Looks at the definition of hyperactivity, its many possible causes, and methods of treatment. Treatment can include family counselling, special school programs, diets and the use of stimulant like drugs.
creator_credit_for_label: University of California, Los Angeles, Maile Ornellas and Catherine Allan
